name: Nicolás Antonelli
text: Joaquín is a very capable person, persistent in pursuing goals even when they are difficult or require learning new things to achieve them. He knows when to ask for help and when to offer it to others, and is not afraid to propose and implement improvements whenever he finds them.

name: Federico Gabriel Castro
text: Without a doubt a great person I had the pleasure of working with, collaborating side by side on the development of an online casino where I was able to witness his outstanding React.js skills firsthand.

name: Alejandro Manuel Navarini
text: Joaquin is a very tenacious developer and excels at learning new skills.

name: Priscila Sacchi
text: Joaquín is an excellent professional, always willing to learn new things. A great teammate, charismatic and always ready to help everyone.
